    • Method Detail

      • lookupById

        public static Token lookupById(java.lang.Long id)
        Lookup an token by id You probably want ActivationKeyFactory.lookupById() instead. The Token does not include the actual hex string used for registration, or the relationship to the kickstart session(s). WARNING - This method should be used very carefully, because it doesn't filter out based on org
        Parameters:
        id - the id to search for
        Returns:
        the ActivationKey found

      • lookup

        public static Token lookup(java.lang.Long id,
                           Org org)
        Lookup an token by id You probably want ActivationKeyFactory.lookupById() instead. The Token does not include the actual hex string used for registration, or the relationship to the kickstart session(s).
        Parameters:
        id - the id to search for
        org - the org to whom the token belongs to
        Returns:
        the ActivationKey found

      • listByServer

        public static java.util.List<Token> listByServer(Server server)
        Lookup a Token for the given Server
        Parameters:
        server - to lookup the Token for
        Returns:
        Token if found. Null if not

        public static void save(Token tokenIn)
        Saves a token to the database
        Parameters:
